title: How do I change the input method when editing a message?
answer:
Create a message, and touch the text field to bring up the onscreen keyboard. The default input method is Huawei Swype. Swipe down on the screen to open the status bar, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=64076), and select an input method. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=64077)
